5.eng-name: The Book of Mosques and Places of Prayer

hadiths.text: Qatada reported it on the authority of Anas b. Malik that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:When any one of you omits the prayer due to sleep or he forgets it, he should observe it when he remembers it, for Allah has said:" Observe prayer for remembrance of Me

chapter.ara-name: باب قَضَاءِ الصَّلاَةِ الْفَائِتَةِ وَاسْتِحْبَابِ تَعْجِيلِ قَضَائِهَا
chapter.eng-name: Making up a missed prayer. And it is recommended to hasten to make it up
